row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 4)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 1)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 0)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 4)

col_desc: Queen has zero mini challenge wins.
